favourite.article: My Rock when I am in trial.
It's so soothing to know we have a caring and understanding Father.
Brother, you and your family are in my prayers. I hope to hear things are better.

I am sitting here and watching my loving wife on a sick bed. Our two children playing oblivious of the great sorrow that has overtaken me. With the song in the background and an uncertain future, I am trying to pull myself together. Please pray for us.
Whenever I remember that the Lord cares and thinks of me I am strong in all trials. He has promised not to leave us orphans.
What a comforting God we have. Day and Night, in joy and in sorrow, His thoughts are with us.
I'm facing trials of unemployment, but the song has really inspired. Thank you all at Hymnal.net for a wonderful job.

It is very comforting that no matter what we go through God is thinking about us. Our friends or family may forget about us, but God has us in His thoughts and He wants the best for us. Praise His holy name. We serve a loving compassionate Father!!!!
